info.title: Odoo External API
info.description:
Odoo is an open-source ERP platform that provides external API access via XML-RPC and JSON-RPC. This specification covers the publicly available endpoints for interacting with Odoo models and data.

**Note:** Access to the external API is only available on Custom Odoo pricing plans. Access is not available on One App Free or Standard plans.

## Authentication
Odoo uses either username/password or API keys for authentication. The authenticate method returns a user ID (uid) that must be used in subsequent API calls.

## Common Models
- `res.partner`: Partners (contacts, customers, vendors)
- `sale.order`: Sales orders
- `sale.order.line`: Sales order lines
- `product.product`: Products
- `product.template`: Product templates
- `account.move`: Invoices and journal entries
- `purchase.order`: Purchase orders
- `stock.picking`: Inventory operations
- `res.users`: System users
- `ir.model`: Model metadata
- `ir.model.fields`: Field metadata

post.description:
Executes a method on an Odoo model. This is the main endpoint for all CRUD operations.

Common methods:
- `search`: Find record IDs matching a domain filter
- `search_count`: Count records matching a domain filter
- `read`: Read field values from records
- `search_read`: Combined search and read operation
- `create`: Create a new record
- `write`: Update existing records
- `unlink`: Delete records
- `fields_get`: Get field metadata
- `name_search`: Search records by name
Search for partner records (contacts, customers, vendors) matching the specified domain filter. Returns a list of record IDs.
Count the number of partner records matching the specified domain filter.
Read field values from partner records. By default, reads all fields the user has access to.
Combined search and read operation. Searches for partners matching the domain filter and returns their field values in a single request.
Create a new partner record (contact, customer, or vendor). Returns the ID of the created record.
Update one or more partner records. All specified records will receive the same field values.
Delete one or more partner records.
Get metadata about the fields available on the res.partner model.
Search for sales orders matching the domain filter and return their field values.
Create a new sales order. Returns the ID of the created order.
Search for products matching the domain filter and return their field values.
Search for invoices (account.move records with move_type = 'out_invoice') and return their field values.
Search for purchase orders matching the domain filter and return their field values.
Search for inventory operations (pickings/transfers) matching the domain filter and return their field values.
Get metadata about installed Odoo models. Useful for discovering available models and their properties.
Get metadata about fields in Odoo models. Useful for discovering available fields and their properties.

Array containing a list of record IDs to delete

DomainFilter.description: Domain filter following Odoo's domain syntax. Array of tuples: [field, operator, value]. Operators: =, !=, >, >=, <, <=, like, ilike, in, not in, child_of. Logical operators: &, |, !
